sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 20 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Focus on one recent situation.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### Focus
- Topic: an avoided task

### Situation snapshot
- What happened? ______
- Where/when? ______
- Who was involved? ______

### Thoughts and feelings
- Automatic thoughts: ______
- Feelings (0-10): ______
- Body signals: ______

### Balanced view
- Evidence for the thought: ______
- Evidence against the thought: ______
- A more balanced thought: ______

### Next step
- One small action I can try: ______

sections.title: Clinician notes
sections.markdown:
- Draft-only, clinician review required.
- Invite the client to share highlights in session and reinforce skill use.
- Track patterns in thoughts and link them to behaviors.
- If avoidance is present, break actions into smaller steps.
